String.string: Speak with Morick in Goblin Smugglers' League.
"Frog, shiny things, crystal merchant. Got it."
Talk to Garta in Goblin Smugglers' League.
Go to Jintarot, the crystal merchant in Goblin Smugglers' League.

You can hear the frog croaking from the top of the wagon.
Report to Garta.
Search the big wagon behind Jintarot's tent.
Report to Garta of Goblin Smugglers' League.
